results.title: Greene Warns of “Mark of the Beast,” Gabbard Cries “Deep State Coup”
results.summary: Salon reports on Marjorie Taylor Greene's claim that digital currency initiatives signal the 'mark of the beast' from Revelation 13:16–17. The article quotes a theologian who disputes Greene's interpretation, stating the mark is an economic symbol of allegiance in the ancient world, not tied to modern technology. The author warns against conflating biblical prophecy with secular conspiracies, which undermines theological integrity.

title: Greene Warns of “Mark of the Beast,” Gabbard Cries “Deep State Coup”
